short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Helper extension for mass creating challenges in the game Lanista

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
- Allows the user to set race specific tactics and give up percentages for each gladiator.
- Makes it possible to challenge each race with the specified tactic using a single button.
- Adds in-game timers with cooldowns
